entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
